description: Im independent loyal loving woman looking for love looking to start a family with someone who works is mature and grown and that's not a abuser emotionally or physically. im a non smoker and l believe in time ill find the man god in store for me i have my own house car and income. Im done being alone i want to be loved just like anyone else. I know how to make a man happy I can cook about anything and I’m very affectionate and loving someday I’ll make the rite man very happy ???? in gods time!!
